data.lyric:
[ti:The Good Side]
[ar:Troye Sivan]
[al:The Good Side]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]The Good Side - Troye Sivan (特洛耶·希文)
[00:06.06]Lyricist：Troye Sivan Mellet/Brett McLaughlin/Bram Inscore/Alexandra Hughes/Jack Latham/Ariel Rechtshaid
[00:12.13]Composer：Troye Sivan Mellet/Brett McLaughlin/Bram Inscore/Alexandra Hughes/Jack Latham/Ariel Rechtshaid
[00:18.19]Producer：Ariel Rechtshaid/Bram Inscore/Jam City
[00:24.26]I got the good side of things
[00:27.74]
[00:28.65]Left you with both of the rings
[00:32.20]
[00:32.75]My fingers danced and swayed in the breeze
[00:37.01]The change in the wind took you down to your knees
[00:41.42]I got the good side of you
[00:44.57]
[00:45.77]Send it out into the blue
[00:48.93]
[00:50.04]The people danced to the sound of your heart
[00:54.36]The world sang along to it falling apart
[00:58.50]But I sympathize and I recognize
[01:06.24]And baby I apologize
[01:09.95]
[01:10.51]That I got the good side
[01:13.86]The good side of things
[01:17.56]
[01:33.66]I got the good side of life
[01:36.73]
[01:37.92]Travelled the universe twice
[01:41.28]
[01:42.17]So many thoughts I wanted to share
[01:46.37]But I didn't call 'cause it wouldn't be fair
[01:50.79]Then I got the good side of new
[01:54.31]
[01:54.93]Found arms to fall right into
[01:58.25]
[01:59.54]I know how it looked it wasn't the plan
[02:03.80]And some day I hope that you'll understand
[02:07.94]That I sympathize and I recognize
[02:15.71]And baby I apologize
[02:19.95]That I got the good side
[02:23.28]The good side of things
[02:26.29]
[02:43.11]I'm sure we'll meet in the spring
[02:45.74]
[02:47.32]And catch up on everything
[02:50.21]
[02:51.49]I'll say I'm proud of all that you've done
[02:55.83]You taught me the ropes and you taught me to love
[02:59.80]But I sympathize and I recognize
[03:07.68]And baby I apologize
[03:11.49]
[03:12.08]That I got the good side
[03:14.67]
[03:15.22]The good side of things
[03:18.21]Sympathize recognize
[03:25.17]
[03:26.97]Apologize
[03:29.45]That I got the good side
[03:32.62]The good side of things
data.trans:
[ti:The Good Side]
[ar:Troye Sivan]
[al:The Good Side]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:06.06]//
[00:12.13]//
[00:18.19]//
[00:24.26]我只想记得事情美好的一面
[00:27.74]
[00:28.65]把两枚戒指都留给了你做纪念
[00:32.20]
[00:32.75]我的指尖跳跃着 随着微风摇曳
[00:37.01]突如其来的变故 让你不禁双膝跪地
[00:41.42]我只记得你最美好的模样
[00:44.57]
[00:45.77]却渐渐陷入了忧郁的漩涡
[00:48.93]
[00:50.04]人们跳着舞 随着你心跳的节奏
[00:54.36]在一切倾倒时 这世界也轻声附和
[00:58.50]但我只能同情惋惜 过去种种浮现眼前
[01:06.24]宝贝 我很抱歉
[01:09.95]
[01:10.51]我只记得事情美好的一面
[01:13.86]只记得那些美好
[01:17.56]
[01:33.66]我只记得生活美好的一面
[01:36.73]
[01:37.92]在浩瀚的宇宙中来回穿越
[01:41.28]
[01:42.17]有太多想法想要与你分享
[01:46.37]但我没有拨通电话 因为这对你不公平
[01:50.79]然后我看到了新事物美好的一面
[01:54.31]
[01:54.93]找到了可以投入的温暖怀抱
[01:58.25]
[01:59.54]我知道这很残忍 我也不曾预料
[02:03.80]我希望有一天你能理解
[02:07.94]我只能同情惋惜 过去种种浮现眼前
[02:15.71]宝贝 我很抱歉
[02:19.95]我只记得事情美好的一面
[02:23.28]只记得那些美好
[02:26.29]
[02:43.11]我相信我们会在春暖花开时重逢
[02:45.74]
[02:47.32]聊聊各自的生活
[02:50.21]
[02:51.49]我会说 我为你所做的一切而骄傲
[02:55.83]你教会我成长 教会我如何去爱
[02:59.80]但我只能同情惋惜 过去种种浮现眼前
[03:07.68]宝贝 我很抱歉
[03:11.49]
[03:12.08]我只记得事情美好的一面
[03:14.67]
[03:15.22]只记得那些美好
[03:18.21]但我只能同情惋惜 过去种种浮现眼前
[03:25.17]
[03:26.97]我很抱歉
[03:29.45]我只记得事情美好的一面
[03:32.62]只记得那些美好
